amendment.description: Amendment provides that the amendments specified in the first section of the resolution shall not be subject to a demand for division of the question in the House or in the Committee of the Whole.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide that the amendments specified in the first section of this resolution shall not be subject to a demand for division of the question in the House or in the Committee of the Whole.

action.text: On ordering the previous question on the amendment and Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 245 - 176 (Roll no. 654).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Polis (CO) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
